00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager(PagingLandScapeSceneManager * scnMgr):
00036         mScnMgr(scnMgr),
00037         mTileSize (0),
00038         mNumIndexes (0)
00039     {
00040       
00041     }
00042     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043     PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::~PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager()
00044     {
00045        clear();
00046     }
00047     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     void PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::load()
00049     {
00050         const unsigned int tileSize = mScnMgr->getOptions()->TileSize;
00051         const unsigned int numIndexes = mScnMgr->getOptions()->maxRenderLevel + 1;
00052         
00053         if (tileSize != mTileSize || numIndexes != mNumIndexes)
00054         {
00055                         // Clear
00056             mLevelIndex.reserve (numIndexes);
00057             mLevelIndex.resize (numIndexes);
00058             for (unsigned int k = 0; k < numIndexes; k++)
00059             {
00060                 mLevelIndex[k] = new IndexMap();
00061             }
00062            
00063             mNumIndexes = numIndexes;
00064             mTileSize = tileSize;
00065         }
00066     }
00067     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     void PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::clear()
00069         {
00070                 if (!mLevelIndex.empty())
00071                 {
00072                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumIndexes; i++)
00073                         {
00074                                 delete mLevelIndex[i];
00075                         }
00076                         mLevelIndex.clear();
00077                 }
00078                 if (!mCache.empty())
00079                 {
00080                         const size_t cachesize = mCache.size ();
00081                         for(size_t j = 0; j < cachesize; j++)
00082                         {
00083                                 delete mCache[j];
00084                         }
00085                         mCache.clear();
00086                 }
00087     }
00088     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00089     IndexData *PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::getIndexData(const int renderLevel,
00090                                                         PagingLandScapeRenderable **Neighbors)
00091     {
00092         assert (renderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00093         assert (renderLevel >= 0) ;
00094 
00095         unsigned int stitchFlags = 0;
00096 
00097         bool eastStitch;
00098         if (Neighbors[ EAST ] &&
00099             Neighbors[ EAST ]->isLoaded () && Neighbors[ EAST ]->isVisible ()  &&
00100             Neighbors[ EAST ]->mRenderLevel > renderLevel)
00101         { 
00102             assert (Neighbors[ EAST ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00103             stitchFlags |= STITCH_EAST;
00104             stitchFlags |= 
00105                     (Neighbors[ EAST ]->mRenderLevel - renderLevel) << STITCH_EAST_SHIFT;
00106             eastStitch = true;
00107         }
00108         else
00109         {
00110             eastStitch = false;
00111         }
00112 
00113         bool westStitch;
00114         if (Neighbors[ WEST ] &&  
00115             Neighbors[ WEST ]->isLoaded () && Neighbors[ WEST ]->isVisible ()  &&
00116             Neighbors[ WEST ]->mRenderLevel > renderLevel)
00117         {
00118             assert (Neighbors[ WEST ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00119             stitchFlags |= STITCH_WEST;
00120             stitchFlags |= 
00121                 (Neighbors[ WEST ]->mRenderLevel - renderLevel) << STITCH_WEST_SHIFT;
00122             westStitch = true;
00123         }    
00124         else
00125         {
00126             westStitch = false;
00127         }
00128 
00129         bool northStitch;
00130         if (Neighbors[ NORTH ] && 
00131             Neighbors[ NORTH ]->isLoaded () && Neighbors[ NORTH ]->isVisible () &&
00132             Neighbors[ NORTH ]->mRenderLevel > renderLevel)
00133         {
00134             assert (Neighbors[ NORTH ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00135             stitchFlags |= STITCH_NORTH;
00136             stitchFlags |= 
00137                 (Neighbors[ NORTH ]->mRenderLevel - renderLevel) << STITCH_NORTH_SHIFT;
00138             northStitch = true;
00139         }    
00140         else
00141         {
00142             northStitch = false;
00143         }
00144 
00145         bool southStitch;
00146         if (Neighbors[ SOUTH ] && 
00147             Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->isLoaded () && Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->isVisible () &&
00148             Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->mRenderLevel > renderLevel)
00149         {
00150             assert (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00151             stitchFlags |= STITCH_SOUTH;
00152             stitchFlags |= 
00153                 (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->mRenderLevel - renderLevel) << STITCH_SOUTH_SHIFT;
00154             southStitch = true;
00155         }    
00156         else
00157         {
00158             southStitch = false;
00159         }
00160 
00161 
00162         // Check preexisting
00163         assert (mLevelIndex.size() > (unsigned int)renderLevel);
00164         IndexMap::iterator ii = mLevelIndex[ renderLevel ]->find(stitchFlags);
00165         if (ii == mLevelIndex[ renderLevel ]->end())
00166         {
00167             // Create
00168             IndexData* indexData = generateTriListIndexes(northStitch, 
00169                                                         southStitch,
00170                                                         eastStitch,
00171                                                         westStitch, 
00172                                                         renderLevel,
00173                                                         Neighbors);
00174                                                         
00175                         mCache.push_back(indexData);
00176             mLevelIndex[ renderLevel ]->insert(
00177                 IndexMap::value_type(stitchFlags, indexData));
00178                 
00179             indexData->optimiseVertexCacheTriList();
00180             
00181             return indexData;
00182         }
00183         else
00184         {
00185             return  ii->second;
00186         }
00187 
00188     }
00189 
00190     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00191     IndexData* PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::generateTriListIndexes(const bool northStitch, 
00192                                                                   const bool southStitch,
00193                                                                   const bool eastStitch,
00194                                                                   const bool westStitch,
00195                                                                 const int RenderLevel,
00196                                                                 PagingLandScapeRenderable **Neighbors) const
00197     {
00198         const int step = 1 << RenderLevel;
00199         assert (step > 0);
00200 
00201 
00202         const unsigned int tileSize = mTileSize;
00203         const unsigned int new_length = (tileSize / step) * (tileSize / step) * 2 * 2 * 2;
00204         
00205         IndexData* indexData = new IndexData();
00206         assert (indexData);
00207 
00208         const bool is32bits = new_length > 65535  ? true : false;      
00209         indexData->indexBuffer = 
00210             HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton().createIndexBuffer(
00211                                         (is32bits)  ? HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT : HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_16BIT,
00212                                         new_length, 
00213                                         HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00214 
00215 
00216         
00217         const unsigned int north = northStitch ? step : 0;
00218         const unsigned int south = southStitch ? step : 0;
00219         const unsigned int east = eastStitch ? step : 0;
00220         const unsigned int west = westStitch ? step : 0;
00221 
00222 
00223         unsigned int numIndexes = 0;
00224         const unsigned int step_offset = step * tileSize;
00225         unsigned int height_count = north * tileSize;
00226         void *idx;
00227         if (is32bits)
00228         {
00230             unsigned int * ogre_restrict pIdx = static_cast<unsigned int*>(indexData->indexBuffer->lock(0, 
00231                                                 indexData->indexBuffer->getSizeInBytes(), 
00232                                                 HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00233             assert (pIdx);
00234             for (unsigned int j = north; j < tileSize - 1 - south; j += step)
00235             {
00236                 for (unsigned int i = west; i <  tileSize - 1 - east; i += step)
00237                 {
00238                     //triangles
00239                     assert ((i + step + height_count + step_offset) < (tileSize * tileSize));
00240 
00241 
00242                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<unsigned int> (i        + height_count);                 numIndexes++;      
00243                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<unsigned int> (i        + height_count + step_offset);   numIndexes++; 
00244                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<unsigned int> (i + step + height_count);                 numIndexes++; 
00245                     
00246                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<unsigned int> (i        + height_count + step_offset);   numIndexes++;    
00247                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<unsigned int> (i + step + height_count + step_offset);   numIndexes++; 
00248                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<unsigned int> (i + step + height_count);                 numIndexes++; 
00249                 }
00250                 height_count += step_offset;
00251             }  
00252             idx = pIdx;
00253         }
00254         else
00255         {            
00257             ushort * ogre_restrict pIdx = static_cast<ushort*>(indexData->indexBuffer->lock(0, 
00258                                                 indexData->indexBuffer->getSizeInBytes(), 
00259                                                 HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00260             assert (pIdx);
00261             for (unsigned int j = north; j < tileSize - 1 - south; j += step)
00262             {
00263                 for (unsigned int i = west; i <  tileSize - 1 - east; i += step)
00264                 {
00265                     //triangles
00266                     assert ((i + step + height_count + step_offset) < ((tileSize) * (tileSize)));
00267 
00268 
00269                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i        + height_count);                 numIndexes++;      
00270                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i        + height_count + step_offset);   numIndexes++; 
00271                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i + step + height_count);                 numIndexes++; 
00272                     
00273                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i        + height_count + step_offset);   numIndexes++;    
00274                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i + step + height_count + step_offset);   numIndexes++; 
00275                     *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (i + step + height_count);                 numIndexes++; 
00276                 }
00277                 height_count += step_offset;
00278             }
00279             idx = pIdx;
00280         }
00281         assert (numIndexes < new_length);
00282 
00283         // North stitching
00284         assert (RenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00285         if (northStitch)
00286         {
00287             assert (Neighbors[ NORTH ]);
00288             assert (Neighbors[ NORTH ]->isLoaded ());
00289             assert (Neighbors[ NORTH ]->isVisible ());
00290             assert (Neighbors[ NORTH ]->mRenderLevel > RenderLevel);
00291             assert (Neighbors[ NORTH ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00292             numIndexes += stitchEdge(NORTH, RenderLevel, Neighbors[NORTH]->mRenderLevel,
00293                 westStitch , eastStitch , &idx, is32bits);
00294         }
00295         // East stitching
00296         if (eastStitch)
00297         {
00298             assert (Neighbors[ EAST ]);
00299             assert (Neighbors[ EAST ]->isLoaded ());
00300             assert (Neighbors[ EAST ]->isVisible ());
00301             assert (Neighbors[ EAST ]->mRenderLevel > RenderLevel);
00302             assert (Neighbors[ EAST ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00303             numIndexes += stitchEdge(EAST, RenderLevel, Neighbors[EAST]->mRenderLevel,
00304                 northStitch, southStitch, &idx, is32bits);
00305         }
00306         // South stitching
00307         if (southStitch)
00308         {
00309             assert (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]);
00310             assert (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->isLoaded ());
00311             assert (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->isVisible ());
00312             assert (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->mRenderLevel > RenderLevel);
00313             assert (Neighbors[ SOUTH ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00314             numIndexes += stitchEdge(SOUTH, RenderLevel, Neighbors[SOUTH]->mRenderLevel,
00315                 eastStitch , westStitch, &idx, is32bits);
00316         }
00317         // West stitching
00318         if (westStitch)
00319         {
00320             assert (Neighbors[ WEST ]);
00321             assert (Neighbors[ WEST ]->isLoaded ());
00322             assert (Neighbors[ WEST ]->isVisible ());
00323             assert (Neighbors[ WEST ]->mRenderLevel > RenderLevel);
00324             assert (Neighbors[ WEST ]->mRenderLevel < static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes));
00325             numIndexes += stitchEdge(WEST, RenderLevel, Neighbors[WEST]->mRenderLevel,
00326                 southStitch , northStitch, &idx, is32bits);
00327         }
00328 
00329         assert (numIndexes < new_length);
00330 
00331         indexData->indexBuffer->unlock();
00332         indexData->indexCount = numIndexes;
00333         indexData->indexStart = 0;
00334 
00335         return indexData;
00336     }
00337     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00338     unsigned int PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::stitchEdge(const Neighbor neighbor, 
00339                                                 const int hiLOD, const int loLOD, 
00340                                                 const bool omitFirstTri, const bool omitLastTri, 
00341                                                 void** ppIdx, 
00342                                                 const bool is32bits) const
00343     {
00344         assert(loLOD > hiLOD);
00345         /* 
00346         Now do the stitching; we can stitch from any level to any level.
00347         The stitch pattern is like this for each pair of vertices in the lower LOD
00348         (excuse the poor ascii art):
00349 
00350         lower LOD
00351         *-----------*
00352         |\  \ 3 /  /|
00353         |1\2 \ / 4/5|
00354         *--*--*--*--*
00355         higher LOD
00356 
00357         The algorithm is, for each pair of lower LOD vertices:
00358         1. Iterate over the higher LOD vertices, generating tris connected to the 
00359         first lower LOD vertex, up to and including 1/2 the span of the lower LOD 
00360         over the higher LOD (tris 1-2). Skip the first tri if it is on the edge 
00361         of the tile and that edge is to be stitched itself.
00362         2. Generate a single tri for the middle using the 2 lower LOD vertices and 
00363         the middle vertex of the higher LOD (tri 3). 
00364         3. Iterate over the higher LOD vertices from 1/2 the span of the lower LOD
00365         to the end, generating tris connected to the second lower LOD vertex 
00366         (tris 4-5). Skip the last tri if it is on the edge of a tile and that
00367         edge is to be stitched itself.
00368 
00369         The same algorithm works for all edges of the patch; stitching is done
00370         clockwise so that the origin and steps used change, but the general
00371         approach does not.
00372         */
00373 
00374 
00375         // Work out the steps ie how to increment indexes
00376         // Step from one vertex to another in the high detail version
00377         int step = 1 << hiLOD;
00378         // Step from one vertex to another in the low detail version
00379         int superstep = 1 << loLOD;
00380         // Step half way between low detail steps
00381         int halfsuperstep = superstep >> 1;
00382 
00383         // Work out the starting points and sign of increments
00384         // We always work the strip clockwise
00385         int startx, starty, endx, rowstep;
00386         bool horizontal;
00387         
00388         const int tileSize = static_cast <int> (mTileSize - 1);
00389         switch (neighbor)
00390         {
00391             case NORTH:
00392                 startx = starty = 0;
00393                 endx =  tileSize;
00394                 rowstep = step;
00395                 horizontal = true;
00396                 break;
00397             case SOUTH:
00398                 // invert x AND y direction, helps to keep same winding
00399                 startx = starty = tileSize;
00400                 endx = 0;
00401                 rowstep = -step;
00402                 step = -step;
00403                 superstep = -superstep;
00404                 halfsuperstep = -halfsuperstep;
00405                 horizontal = true;
00406                 break;
00407             case EAST:
00408                 startx = 0;
00409                 endx = tileSize;
00410                 starty = tileSize;
00411                 rowstep = -step;
00412                 horizontal = false;
00413                 break;
00414             case WEST:
00415                 startx = tileSize;
00416                 endx = 0;
00417                 starty = 0;
00418                 rowstep = step;
00419                 step = -step;
00420                 superstep = -superstep;
00421                 halfsuperstep = -halfsuperstep;
00422                 horizontal = false;
00423                 break;
00424                 default:
00425                 startx = 0;
00426                 endx = 0;
00427                 starty = 0;
00428                 rowstep = 0;
00429                 step = 0;
00430                 superstep = 0;
00431                 halfsuperstep = 0;
00432                 horizontal = false;
00433                 assert (0);
00434                     break;
00435         };
00436         assert (*ppIdx);
00437         unsigned int numIndexes = 0;
00438         const bool isHorizontal = horizontal;
00439         if (is32bits)
00440         {
00441             // Get pointer to be updated
00442             unsigned int* ogre_restrict pIdx = static_cast <unsigned int*> (*ppIdx);
00443             for (int j = startx; j != endx; j += superstep)
00444             {
00445                 int k; 
00446                 for (k = 0; k != halfsuperstep; k += step)
00447                 {
00448                     int jk = j + k;
00449                     //skip the first bit of the corner?
00450                     if (j != startx || k != 0 || !omitFirstTri)
00451                     {
00452                         if (isHorizontal)
00453                         {
00454                             *pIdx++ = _index32(j , starty); numIndexes++;
00455                             *pIdx++ = _index32(jk, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00456                             *pIdx++ = _index32(jk + step, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00457                         }
00458                         else
00459                         {
00460                             *pIdx++ = _index32(starty, j); numIndexes++;
00461                             *pIdx++ = _index32(starty + rowstep, jk); numIndexes++;
00462                             *pIdx++ = _index32(starty + rowstep, jk + step); numIndexes++;
00463                         }
00464                     }
00465                 }
00466 
00467                 // Middle tri
00468                 if (isHorizontal)
00469                 {
00470                     *pIdx++ = _index32(j, starty); numIndexes++;
00471                     *pIdx++ = _index32(j + halfsuperstep, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00472                     *pIdx++ = _index32(j + superstep, starty); numIndexes++;
00473                 }
00474                 else
00475                 {
00476                     *pIdx++ = _index32(starty, j); numIndexes++;
00477                     *pIdx++ = _index32(starty + rowstep, j + halfsuperstep); numIndexes++;
00478                     *pIdx++ = _index32(starty, j + superstep); numIndexes++;
00479                 }
00480 
00481                 for (k = halfsuperstep; k != superstep; k += step)
00482                 {
00483                     int jk = j + k;
00484                     if (j != endx - superstep || k != superstep - step || !omitLastTri)
00485                     {
00486                         if (isHorizontal)
00487                         {
00488                             *pIdx++ = _index32(j + superstep, starty); numIndexes++;
00489                             *pIdx++ = _index32(jk, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00490                             *pIdx++ = _index32(jk + step, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00491                         }
00492                         else
00493                         {
00494                             *pIdx++ = _index32(starty, j + superstep); numIndexes++;
00495                             *pIdx++ = _index32(starty + rowstep, jk); numIndexes++;
00496                             *pIdx++ = _index32(starty + rowstep, jk + step); numIndexes++;
00497                         }
00498                     }
00499                 }
00500             }
00501             *ppIdx = pIdx;
00502         }
00503         else
00504         {
00505             // Get pointer to be updated
00506             ushort* ogre_restrict pIdx = static_cast <ushort*> (*ppIdx);
00507             for (int j = startx; j != endx; j += superstep)
00508             {
00509                 int k; 
00510                 for (k = 0; k != halfsuperstep; k += step)
00511                 {
00512                     int jk = j + k;
00513                     //skip the first bit of the corner?
00514                     if (j != startx || k != 0 || !omitFirstTri)
00515                     {
00516                         if (isHorizontal)
00517                         {
00518                             *pIdx++ = _index16(j , starty); numIndexes++;
00519                             *pIdx++ = _index16(jk, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00520                             *pIdx++ = _index16(jk + step, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00521                         }
00522                         else
00523                         {
00524                             *pIdx++ = _index16(starty, j); numIndexes++;
00525                             *pIdx++ = _index16(starty + rowstep, jk); numIndexes++;
00526                             *pIdx++ = _index16(starty + rowstep, jk + step); numIndexes++;
00527                         }
00528                     }
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 // Middle tri
00532                 if (isHorizontal)
00533                 {
00534                     *pIdx++ = _index16(j, starty); numIndexes++;
00535                     *pIdx++ = _index16(j + halfsuperstep, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00536                     *pIdx++ = _index16(j + superstep, starty); numIndexes++;
00537                 }
00538                 else
00539                 {
00540                     *pIdx++ = _index16(starty, j); numIndexes++;
00541                     *pIdx++ = _index16(starty + rowstep, j + halfsuperstep); numIndexes++;
00542                     *pIdx++ = _index16(starty, j + superstep); numIndexes++;
00543                 }
00544 
00545                 for (k = halfsuperstep; k != superstep; k += step)
00546                 {
00547                     int jk = j + k;
00548                     if (j != endx - superstep || k != superstep - step || !omitLastTri)
00549                     {
00550                         if (isHorizontal)
00551                         {
00552                             *pIdx++ = _index16(j + superstep, starty); numIndexes++;
00553                             *pIdx++ = _index16(jk, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00554                             *pIdx++ = _index16(jk + step, starty + rowstep); numIndexes++;
00555                         }
00556                         else
00557                         {
00558                             *pIdx++ = _index16(starty, j + superstep); numIndexes++;
00559                             *pIdx++ = _index16(starty + rowstep, jk); numIndexes++;
00560                             *pIdx++ = _index16(starty + rowstep, jk + step); numIndexes++;
00561                         }
00562                     }
00563                 }
00564             }
00565             *ppIdx = pIdx;
00566         }
00567         return numIndexes;
00568     }
00569 
00570         //*******************
00571         //Added by Fiesch adapted from a post by tonyhnz
00572         IndexData *PagingLandScapeIndexBufferManager::getRawIndexes(int renderLevel)
00573         {
00574                 // no stitching is done
00575             // used to expose terrain vertex data
00576 
00577             if (renderLevel >= static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes))
00578                     renderLevel = static_cast <int> (mNumIndexes)-1;
00579 
00580             if (renderLevel < 0)
00581                     renderLevel =0 ;
00582 
00583             const unsigned int stitchFlags = 0;
00584 
00585             assert (mLevelIndex.size() > (unsigned int)renderLevel);
00586 
00587             IndexMap::iterator ii = mLevelIndex[ renderLevel ]->find( stitchFlags );
00588             if ( ii == mLevelIndex[ renderLevel ]->end())
00589             {
00590                     // Create
00591                     IndexData* indexData = generateTriListIndexes(   false,
00592                                                                             false,
00593                                                                             false,
00594                                                                             false,
00595                                                                             renderLevel,
00596                                                                             0);
00597                     mLevelIndex[ renderLevel ]->insert(
00598                             IndexMap::value_type(stitchFlags, indexData));
00599               
00600                     return indexData;
00601             }
00602             else
00603             {
00604                     return  ii->second;
00605             }
00606         }
